::KitKat::

She gave him half a smile. "Thanks." She took the cubes and looked at 
them. She wondered deaden the pain or deaden her. Her Pred side was 
on the alert since she started this whole plan thing. She figured, 
either way, the pain would be gone. She took the cubes and waited.

She kept her hand to her head." Uh,how long does it take those cubes 
to take effect?"

She remembered parts of the night before.  She remembered talking 
about plans for attacking the ship. But she wasn't sure if her 
kissing Drillbit was  dream or if it really happened.  

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit held his hand out, holding some small energon cubes.
> "I figured you would have one hell of a hangover, so i brought a 
couple
> of these things. They have been coated with a liquid, that will 
deaden
> those cannons in you're head." He woundered if she remembered last
> night.
